title: Spider-Man: Across The Spider-Verse Logo AOP Men's Black Sleep Pajama Pants
features: CUSTOM DESIGN: Miles Morales' red spider logo repeats in different sizes across the black background of these men's sleep pajama pants. This sleepwear makes a great gift for fans of Harlem's friendly neighborhood Spider-Man.

COMFY POLYESTER BLEND: These lounge pants are made with a super soft premium brushed polyester stretch blend that will keep you feeling comfy and cozy while you rest in bed or watch Miles Morales in action in the Into the Spider-Verse movie.

RELAXED FIT: These sleep pajama pants feature a relaxed fit that will help you stay comfortable as you sleep through the night or read about Miles Morales web swinging adventures in the Marvel comic books.

DRAWSTRING: Use the drawstring on the front of these sleep pajama pants to adjust the elastic waistband to the most comfortable fit. Give yourself the gift of comfort and a good night's sleep with this snug and cozy sleepwear.

SIDE POCKETS: These sleep pajama pants come with a pair of side pockets, so you can carry your phone, wallet, headphones, and other essentials with you when you crash overnight at a friend's house or run a quick errand.
description: Web swing into comfort with these Spider-Man sleep pajama pants. The pants come in black and feature repeating images of Miles Morales' red spider logo. The lounge pants with a pair of side pockets and an elastic waistband and drawstring. Celebrate your favorite Marvel superheroes with these comfy and cozy sleep pajama pants.
